languages.text: {n}Сложно что-то сказать по виду покойного кроме того, что он, вероятно, богат — одежда выглядит дорогой, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} — новыми и редкими.{/n}

{n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are new and rare.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сложно что-то сказать по виду покойного кроме того, что он, вероятно, богат — одежда выглядит дорогой, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} — новыми и редкими.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased man's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his implants new and rare.{/n}
{n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased man's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his implants new and rare.{/n}
{n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his implants are new and rare.{/n}
{n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his implants are new and rare.{/n}

{n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are new and rare.{/n}

languages.text: {n}从死者的外表上很难看出什么，但可以确定他生前一定很富有。他的衣服看起来很昂贵，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}也很新，是很罕见的类型。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are new and rare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}从死者的外表上很难看出什么，但可以确定他生前一定很富有。他的衣服看起来很昂贵，他的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}也很新，是很罕见的类型。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Más allá de su riqueza, es difícil determinar algo a partir de la apariencia del difunto: lleva ropa de aspecto caro e {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} nuevos y limitados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are new and rare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Más allá de su riqueza, es difícil determinar algo a partir de la apariencia del difunto: lleva ropa de aspecto caro e {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} nuevos y limitados.{/n}

languages.text: {n}裕福層だということ以外、この人物の外見から何かを読み取るのは難しい。服は高価そうで、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}も新しく、珍しいものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are new and rare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}裕福層だということ以外、この人物の外見から何かを読み取るのは難しい。服は高価そうで、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}も新しく、珍しいものだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aus dem Äußeren des Verstorbenen lässt sich kaum etwas ablesen, außer dem Umstand, dass er wohlhabend gewesen sein muss – seine Kleidung sieht teuer aus, und seine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} sind neu und selten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are new and rare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus dem Äußeren des Verstorbenen lässt sich kaum etwas ablesen, außer dem Umstand, dass er wohlhabend gewesen sein muss – seine Kleidung sieht teuer aus, und seine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} sind neu und selten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'apparence du défunt ne vous donne aucun indice sur sa vie, si ce n'est qu'il devait être riche, comme en témoignent ses vêtements taillés dans des tissus luxueux et ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} rares visiblement neufs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are new and rare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'apparence du défunt ne vous donne aucun indice sur sa vie, si ce n'est qu'il devait être riche, comme en témoignent ses vêtements taillés dans des tissus luxueux et ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} rares visiblement neufs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Merhumun görünümünden, hayli varlıklı biri olduğu dışında bir anlam çıkarmak zor. Kıyafetleri pahalı görünüyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}İmplantları{/g} da yepyeni ve nadir bulunur cinsten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's hard to glean anything from the deceased's appearance apart from the fact that he must have been wealthy — his clothes look expensive, and his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} are new and rare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Merhumun görünümünden hayli varlıklı biri olduğu dışında bir anlam çıkarmak zor. Kıyafetleri pahalı görünüyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantları{/g} yepyeni ve nadir parçalardan oluşuyor.{/n}
